description:
Introduction of WCs to the bedrooms within the existing shower cubicles, using existing services and risers, with local refurbishment restricted to the shower areas 
 Removal of the unoriginal fire lobbies subject to building control and fire brigade approval with localised refurbishment
 Replacement of existing small power and lighting distribution in existing locations to meet current NICEIC regulations, with localised re-plastering and making good with materials to match existing
 Raising the wrought iron balustrade to bedroom 7 balcony to meet building regulations, reusing and extending the existing railing insofar as is possible
 Raised ground floor: removal of the hallway phone booth cubicle, removal of the unoriginal office glazed partition, enlargement of the existing opening between the front and rear reception rooms retaining the wall and cornice over
 Lower ground floor: reconfiguration of the manager's flat, with a new fitted kitchen and shower room, and window onto a courtyard (where the existing kitchen currently is); replacement side infill extension to accommodate new kitchen/dining facilities, relocation of plant and storage to rear vaults. 
 No removal of original closet wing or vaults masonry walls is proposed.
 Resurfacing of terrace with new decking or paving, and new arrangement of skylights.
